attributes.action: Allow Legally Docked Working Dogs to be Shown at All Dog Shows
attributes.additional_details:
To allow legally docked working dogs to be exhibited at all dog shows - not just those who do not charge an entry fee.

Will encourage and support breeds that are bred and worked for purpose to be shown along side their 'show' cousins.

Owners will have to provide proof the dog works and docking certifcate if asked for. Similar to the protocol set out under the current docking legislation,
